mapper.select: SELECT T.* ,BS1.BUS_STATION_NAME AS ARRIVAL_STATION_NAME FROM ( SELECT R.* ,BS.BUS_STATION_NAME AS DEPARTURE_STATION_NAME FROM BUS_STATION AS BS INNER JOIN ROUTE AS R ON BS.BUS_STATION_ID = R.DEPARTURE_ID) T INNER JOIN BUS_STATION AS BS1 ON BS1.BUS_STATION_ID = T.ARRIVAL_ID;

SELECT T.* ,BS1.BUS_STATION_NAME AS ARRIVAL_STATION_NAME FROM ( SELECT R.* ,BS.BUS_STATION_NAME AS DEPARTURE_STATION_NAME FROM BUS_STATION AS BS INNER JOIN ROUTE AS R ON BS.BUS_STATION_ID = R.DEPARTURE_ID) T INNER JOIN BUS_STATION AS BS1 ON BS1.BUS_STATION_ID = T.ARRIVAL_ID WHERE T.ROUTE_ID = #{routeId};
